<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Book a desk">0e0ec65cdb6810d086f16e8cd396195b</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>testsubmit</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
    var fromDate = g_form.getValue('booking_from');
    var tillDate = g_form.getValue('booking_till');
    var chosenDesk = g_form.getValue('desk');
    spModal.alert('There was a problem trying to record your reservation. This typically happens when your chosen desk has been been reserved by someone else while your booking form was open. Please try again with a different desk.');
    

    /*	spModal.open({
    			message: 'There was a problem trying to record your reservation. This typically happens when your chosen desk has been been reserved by someone else while your booking form was open. Please try again with a different desk.',
    			title: 'Error during booking',
    			backdrop: 'static',
    			buttons: [
    			{label: 'OK'}
    			]
    		});
    		*/
    g_form.clearValue('desk');
    g_form.clearValue('choose_floor');
	return false;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>LasBal</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-08 18:39:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ec8d66571b2c9410629d4002cd4bcb46</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>testsubmit</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="MyDesk" source="x_ipegh_mydesk">2612d1bfdb589c9086f16e8cd39619a9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MyDesk">2612d1bfdb589c9086f16e8cd39619a9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ec8d66571b2c9410629d4002cd4bcb46</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>LasBal</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-08 18:43:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
